## It's Easy to Get Started.

Fill out the form below and we'll contact you on your preferred date and time
to discuss your event and confirm your booking.

Your Info

Bar Packages

Drink Packages

Schedule Phone Call

First Name *

## Pick Your Bar Package

Choose Your Bar Package * **1\. Personal Bar ( portable/foldable bar )**
Includes up to three hours bartending time. Two hours set up/tear down prep
time. Includes bartenders, bartending tools. $300.00 **2\. Bartending
Service** Includes one bartender per 50 guests. Includes bartending tools.
$40/hour per bartender **3\. Vintage Mobile Bartending Service Trailer**
Includes up to five hours bartending service. Includes two hour prep / tear
down. Includes bartenders, bartending tools. $600.00

## Pick Your Bar Package

Choose Your Drink Package * **Package 1** \- Beer/Wine . Choose up to five
beers and three wines . Includes wine glasses. $4/person **Package 2** \-
Signature Cocktails. Choose up to 3 signature cocktails. Includes ice, cups,
straws, garnish, mixers. $6/person **Package 3** \- Full Bar. Choose up to 5
beers, three wines, and three signature cocktails. Includes ice, cups, straws,
napkins, garnish, mixers $8/person

## Let's Talk!

Schedule your phone or FaceTime meeting to go over all the details for your
event.

How would you like your call? *Phone CallFaceTime Call

## Packages

your very own professional tended bar at your event.

Take a Look __

## How It Works

Our process is simple and we're excited to create a fun bar experience for you
and your guests.

It's Easy __

## Certified Bartenders

Around the Rim's mobile bar service offers a top-notch experience that brings
the art of mixology directly to your event. Our team consists of certified
bartenders who are passionate about their craft and dedicated to delivering
exceptional service.
